problem.markdown:
1. Rigid blocks topple under all excitations. () True (x) False
2) Response becomes critical under resonating condition. (x) True () False
3) In each cycle amplitude reduces. (x) True () False
4) Wider base objects will be more stable compared to small base objects. (x) True () False
5) If height of the block increases then chances of toppling increases (x) True () False
problem.p: 1. Rigid blocks topple under all excitations.
2) Response becomes critical under resonating condition.
4) Wider base objects will be more stable compared to small base objects.
5) If height of the block increases then chances of toppling increases
